__e: Well, if you boys will excuse us, Trudy and I are due for a little paint and body work.
Wrong again because I asked her, "Would you like to double-date when Mike and Trudy come into town?" - And she said, "Da."
Listen, my mom told me the truth about you and Trudy, but I just had this feeling, and I knew it had to be me who found you, that... this is all happening for a reason.
If I'd known y'all was gonna take your sweet fucking time, I'd have come in.
But Trudy called me when we were at your birthday and they're coming out here in about three weeks.
Trudy's got no right to tell him who he can and cannot break bread with.
